lines: versatile 2 mil, screen printable film can be used on flat and simple curved surfaces and has a unique layflat liner.withstands severe weather and handling conditions encountered by commercial and industrial graphics.

decorative and identification graphics, cautionary and safety labelling, emblems, striping — this film's polyethylene-coating and pressure-sensitive adhesive helps it conform to a variety of indoor and exterior surfaces
